Supreme Court - 2017 Opinions

NOTICE: These opinions are subject to motions for rehearing under Rule 22 as well as formal revision before publication in the New Hampshire Reports. Readers are requested to notify the Reporter, Supreme Court of New Hampshire, One Charles Doe Drive, Concord, New Hampshire 03301, of any editorial errors in order that corrections may be made before the opinion goes to press. Errors may be reported by E-mail at the following address: reporter@courts.state.nh.us.

Opinions are in Adobe Acrobat format (to download a free copy of Adobe Acrobat Reader, go to http://www.adobe.com).

June 22, 2017:

  • 2015-0484, The State of New Hampshire v. Abraham DePaula
  • 2015-0578, The State of New Hampshire v. David J. Widi, Jr.
  • 2015-0624, Exeter Hospital, Inc. v. Steadfast Insurance Company

June 16, 2017

  • 2016-0224, Appeal of Beverly Desmarais

June 9, 2017

  • 2015-0683, State of New Hampshire v. Peggy Starr
  • 2016-0187, In re Search Warrant for Records From AT&T
  • 2016-0305, Segtel, Inc. v. City of Nashua
  • 2016-0357, Condominiums at Lilac Lane Unit Owners’ Association v. Monument Garden, LLC & a.

June 2, 2017

  • 2013-0480, 2013-0635, and 2015-0429, The State of New Hampshire v. Scott Robinson
  • 2015-0625, Appeal of New Hampshire Electric Cooperative, Inc.
  • 2015-0626, Appeal of Public Service Company of New Hampshire d/b/a Eversource Energy

May 26, 2017

  • 2015-0692, Fat Bullies Farm, LLC v. Lori Devenport & a.
  • 2016-0151, DirecTV, Inc. v. Town of New Hampton
  • 2016-0243, In the Matter of Nicholas Kelly and Astrid Fernandes-Prabhu

May 17, 2017

  • 2016-0178, Harvey J. Garod v. Steiner Law Office, PLLC & a.
  • 2016-0350, Robert Carr & a. v. Town of New London

May 12, 2017

  • 2015-0457, The State of New Hampshire v. Kyree Rice
  • 2016-0079, Petition of Eric Willeke and Regina Willeke

April 25, 2017

  • 2015-0404, The State of New Hampshire v. Max Wilson

April 11, 2017

  • 2014-0299, The State of New Hampshire v. Jason Czekalski (Modified May 23, 2017: see court order)
  • 2016-0304, Dartmouth Corporation of Alpha Delta v. Town of Hanover

March 10, 2017

  • 2015-0358, The State of New Hampshire v. Kevin Lynch
  • 2015-0377, The State of New Hampshire v. Jessica Morrill
  • 2016-0176, The State of New Hampshire v. Paul R. Santamaria
  • 2016-0206, Appeal of Kadle Properties Revocable Realty Trust

February 24, 2017

  • 2016-0122, Beverly A. Cluff-Landry v. Roman Catholic Bishop of Manchester
  • 2016-0169, Jeffrey Thomas Clay v. City of Dover & a.

February 17, 2017

  • 2015-0524, The State of New Hampshire v. Robert Breest
  • 2015-0609, Alberto Ramos v. Warden, New Hampshire State Prison
  • 2016-0038, Appeal of Jason Malo

February 15, 2017

  • 2016-0141, Holloway Automotive Group v. Steven Giacalone
  • 2016-0177, In re Estate of Kathleen Mullin

February 3, 2017

  • LD-2016-0005, Petition of Sanjeev Lath & a.

January 31, 2017

  • 2015-0329, The State of New Hampshire v. William Edic
  • 2015-0570, The State of New Hampshire v. Remi Gross-Santos
